commit.message: remove SauceLibraryManager as we no longer auto updating SC anywhere (since it didn't really work well)
Remove SauceFactory as it was barely a clone of SauceRest. Move everything to sauce rest
update download script to update java file too

files.patch:
@@ -237,6 +237,7 @@ protected void incrementProcessCountForUser(TunnelInformation identifier, PrintS
     /**
      * @param args Arguments to run
      * @param directory Directory to run in
+     * @throws IOException thrown if an error occurs launching the Sauce Connect process
      * @return Processbuilder to run
      */
     protected Process createProcess(String[] args, File directory) throws IOException {

@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
 #!/bin/sh
+DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
+URL=${URL:=https://saucelabs.com/versions.json}
+
 rm sc-*.tar.gz sc-*.zip
-curl https://saucelabs.com/versions.json | jq '.["Sauce Connect"] | values[] | select (type=="object") | .download_url' | xargs wget
+curl -s $URL | jq '.["Sauce Connect"] | values[] | select (type=="object") | .download_url' | xargs wget
+CURRENT_SC_VERSION=$(curl -s $URL | jq '.["Sauce Connect"].version')
+perl -pi -e "s/String CURRENT_SC_VERSION = \"(\d+\.?)+\"/String CURRENT_SC_VERSION = $CURRENT_SC_VERSION/" $DIR/../java/com/saucelabs/ci/sauceconnect/SauceConnectFourManager.java
